column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Kuvira says : " There is a grave injustice that must be corrected .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Are you ready to show the world what a true superpower looks like ?
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Yes .
#Text=I 'm honored to march into the city by your side .
#Text=I love you , Kuvira .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " I never could have done this without your help .
#Text=After we claim victory , we can finally get married and rule our empire together .
#Text=" Korra says : " How 's the evacuation coming ?
#Text=" Wu says : " Could be better .
#Text=At this point we 've evacuated almost ... eighteen families .
#Text=" Korra says : " Only eighteen ?
#Text=There are millions of people in this city !
#Text=" Wu says : " I said it could be better .
#Text=" Mako says : " The problem is , it 's a voluntary evacuation and there are n't very many volunteers .
#Text=They just do n't feel like they 're in any immediate danger .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Guys !
#Text=Good , you 're all here !
#Text=" Raiko says : " What 's with you interrupting my important meetings all the time ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Su ... what are you ... you 're okay !
#Text=I 'm so sorry about Zaofu .
#Text=How did you escape ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Opal , Beifong , and I rescued everyone .
#Text=But we had a run in with Kuvira .
#Text=We saw her super spirit weapon up close .
#Text=Like , really close .
#Text=Way too close .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Is she going to use it against Republic City ?
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " Yes .
#Text=I found out she 's going to attack in two weeks .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Ooh !
#Text=And Zhu Li 's on our side now .
#Text=Actually , she never really switched sides and I 'm just gon na let her explain the whole thing .
#Text=Zhu Li ?
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " I pretended to be loyal to Kuvira so I could sabotage her weapon .
#Text=It did n't work , but I did overhear her plans to attack .
#Text=" Raiko says : " I knew she would n't stop at Zaofu .
#Text=" Lin says : " My guess is , she 's coming by rail .
#Text=It 's the only way she can transport that weapon .
#Text=" Korra says : " Then we 'll cut the rail lines .
#Text=" Raiko says : " I agree .
#Text=But let 's get as many citizens evacuated before we do .
#Text=Put out the announcement .
#Text=The evacuation is now mandatory .
#Text=" Mako says : " We 're on it .
#Text=" Korra says : " Do n't worry Mr. President .
#Text=I wo n't let Kuvira take our city .
#Text="
